last_episode_to_air.name: We Had a Really Good Title for This One... But We Forgot It
last_episode_to_air.overview: MAD uses a memory eraser device to try and defeat Gadget.

name: Inspector Gadget
overview: When Dr. Claw returns, Inspector Gadget is brought out of retirement to defeat him again, now with Penny and Brain's open participation.

episodes.name: Gadget 2.0 (1)
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw returns from the Antarctic, drawing Inspector Gadget out of retirement.

episodes.name: Gadget 2.0 (2)
episodes.overview: Penny and Gadget race to find Dr. Claw's claw before he does.

episodes.name: Towering Towers
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw plots to take over every satellite in the sky

episodes.name: Game Over, Man
episodes.overview: Astronauts are vanishing from the Multinational Space Station, and Gadget must find out why.

episodes.name: Rock Out
episodes.overview: Gadget provides security for a pop star whose army of fans proves an attractive target for Dr. Claw

episodes.name: Strike A Pose
episodes.overview: Gadget protects an invention from MAD thieves.

episodes.name: A Better Class Of MAD
episodes.overview: Gadget, Penny and Brain investigate the disappearance of a movie star

episodes.name: Cough Due To Claw
episodes.overview: When Gadget catches the flu, Penny and Brain must track down a super villain.

episodes.name: Dog Show Days Are Over
episodes.overview: Brain and Penny go undercover at the Dog & Boney show

episodes.name: One Bad Apple
episodes.overview: Gadget, Penny and Brain visit an apple farm where MAD is growing a race of mutant fruits.

episodes.name: Sucks Like MAD
episodes.overview: Gadget and crew infiltrate a vacuum cleaner convention

episodes.name: A Claw For Talon
episodes.overview: Talon tries to prove himself to his uncle by attempting to steal Dr. Claw's training claw.

episodes.name: Gadget's Da Bomb
episodes.overview: Gadget ingests a device that is due to explode

episodes.name: Gadget Management
episodes.overview: Penny goes to a MAD training convention, where Gadget stumbles into an anger management seminar.

episodes.name: Diamond's Are MAD's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Gadget, Penny and Brain search for the Lost City of Diamonds

episodes.name: Ticked Off
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw hires a cuckoo clockmaker to freeze time at a conference in St. Moritz.

episodes.name: You Know the Drill
episodes.overview: Gadget, Penny and Brain travel the to Canadian Arctic to visit a town of happy Gadget fans

episodes.name: Operation HQ Reunion
episodes.overview: MAD stages a high school reunion for Gadget and his pals.

episodes.name: A Hole in One
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw and his mother devise a donut recipe meant to put the world into a stupor

episodes.name: Operation Hocus Pocus
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw uses an evil magician to transform people into henchmen.

episodes.name: MAD Carpet Ride
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw wants to steal a futuristic UltraBlimp

episodes.name: Appy Days
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw gets everyone so addicted to a mobile game that they will perform evil acts to win MADcoins.

episodes.name: Collider Scope
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw plans to destroy Gadget with a device that causes Penny to keep reliving the same bad day

episodes.name: She Got Dangerous Game
episodes.overview: Gadget, Penny and Brain go on a Kenyan safari.

episodes.name: My Gadget Will Go On
episodes.overview: MAD and HQ race to get control of Dr. Claw's dangerous -- and sunken -- submarine

episodes.name: The Gadgetator
episodes.overview: Inspector Gadget goes undercover as a wrestler and fights to win.

episodes.name: Head Case
episodes.overview: Penny accidentally awakens a race of automatons buried beneath Easter Island's giant heads

episodes.name: Start Your Gadgets
episodes.overview: Gadget and Penny enter a prestigious car race.

episodes.name: Mind of MADder
episodes.overview: The crew searches a Tibetan monastery for the Helmet of Thought, which gives the wearer incredible mental powers

episodes.name: Train-ing Day
episodes.overview: Talon hijacks an ultramodern train.

episodes.name: Ice, Ice Yeti
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw plans to use radio waves to melt the polar ice caps

episodes.name: MAD Soaker
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw plots against a party where he was snubbed, dousing it in water from Loch Ness.

episodes.name: Lost in the Lost City of Atlantis
The Fountain of Cortez
episodes.overview: The Chief and an archeologist are turned into babies from the fountain of youth.

episodes.name: Evil U
episodes.overview: Penny infiltrates a school for super villains in training where she becomes friends with Mal, one of the students.

episodes.name: WereBrain of London
episodes.overview: Brain is turned into a monster in London after Talon spills some sort of chemical on him.

episodes.name: Airhead to the Throne
episodes.overview: With Claw out of town Talon takes over MAD and begins destroying communication towers.

episodes.name: Lost in the Lost City of Atlantis
episodes.overview: Penny and Talon both race to find the City Sinker in the lost city of Atlantis.

episodes.name: A Penny Saved
episodes.overview: Dr Claw attempts to steal the world's largest coin (The Giganto) in order to hypnotize the population of New York.

episodes.name: Double O'Penny
episodes.overview: After almost getting killed by a missile, Penny finally calls Gadget out for his incompetence and always putting her in danger, but she is driven with guilt. Meanwhile, Talon and Claw create a clone of Penny to destroy Gadget.

episodes.name: We Heart Gadget
episodes.overview: Gadget and MAD agent Sue Donym go on a date, each trying to uncover secrets from the other.

episodes.name: Tiny Talon Time
episodes.overview: Talon shrinks himself in order to steal Gadget's schematics.

episodes.name: Fellowsheep of the Ring
episodes.overview: Everyone must go without technology when a tech nullifier is set up in New Zealand.

episodes.name: A Clawruption
episodes.overview: MAD plans to cause a Hawaiian volcano to erupt to blot put the sun.

episodes.name: Forever MAD
episodes.overview: MAD sets out to create a Broadway show with the goal of ruining all musicals.

episodes.name: Beyond Gadgetdome
episodes.overview: MAD sets out to deface as many world landmarks as possible in a competition with Baron Von Steeltoe.

episodes.name: Brain Drain
episodes.overview: In an attempt to steal HQ's passcodes Talon switches MADcat and Brain's minds.

episodes.name: What Is...the MADtrix
episodes.overview: Penny and Gadget are trapped in HQ's Holoroom with Talon in control.

episodes.name: Most Extreme Gadget Challenge
episodes.overview: Gadget enters a Japanese gameshow with MAD Cat as the host.

episodes.name: Pyramid Scheme
episodes.overview: Mad tries to sink the pyramids of Giza and Gadget must stop them.

episodes.name: Back to the MAD Future
episodes.overview: Talon is sent back in time to help Dr. Claw become a better villain.

episodes.name: Tool Russia, With Love
episodes.overview: When MAD's latest mission in Siberia threatens to bring about a new ice-age, Gadget and Penny must team up with their Russian counterparts, Comrade Multi-Use-Tool and his niece Pasha.

episodes.name: Low Speed
episodes.overview: As Gadget drives the HQ bus to an annual retreat Talon plants a booby trap on it.

episodes.name: Jurassic Jerk
episodes.overview: Claw sends Talon to steal a dinosaur egg so he can clone an army of dinosaurs.

episodes.name: Assistant Chief McFibber
episodes.overview: Talon disguises himself as Assistant Chief McFibber and infiltrates HQ.

episodes.name: Drone of Silence
episodes.overview: MAD uses special drones to silence people's voices, starting with opera singers.

episodes.name: Growing Like Mad
episodes.overview: Talon steals a mutagen that causes plants to grow to enormous size.

episodes.name: MAD Money
episodes.overview: When HQ runs low on funds, Gadget sets out to raise money.

episodes.name: Baking Bad
episodes.overview: Talon disguises himself as a Sweetie Scout in an effort to sneak into HQ and steal an invisibility spray.

episodes.name: Tempest in a Tea Cup
episodes.overview: MAD sets out to stop a peace summit between two nations.

episodes.name: Mr. Security
episodes.overview: Talon tries to steal Professor Von Slickstein's new AI, Mr. Security, but instead causes the it to go berserk.

episodes.name: Cooking with Claw
episodes.overview: MAD begins kidnapping the world's greatest chefs, so Gadget opens a restaurant to act as bait.

episodes.name: Catnipped in the Bud
episodes.overview: When MADcat begins consuming large amounts of catnip, Claw sets out to wipe out all plants, including catnip.

episodes.name: Cuckoo for Talon
episodes.overview: MAD steals bells from across the globe so they can build a device to level London.

episodes.name: Fayre Game
episodes.overview: When Gadget accidentally uses a time diamond to send himself, Brain, Penny and Talon back to the middle ages, Penny and Talon compete for possession of the gem.

episodes.name: Picnic Pests
episodes.overview: Claw sends a robotic mole to spy on the HQ company picnic.

episodes.name: Talent Show Off
episodes.overview: Claw enters MADcat in the Metro City talent show hoping to win the prize, being mayor for a day.

episodes.name: Gadget & Oatsfunkle
episodes.overview: Talon impersonates Gadget's former band partner so they can record a new song for Claw. Meanwhile, Penny goes on her first solo mission.

episodes.name: Metro City's Sinking
episodes.overview: Claw demands tunnels be dug under Metro City so that he can avoid gridlock traffic.

episodes.name: The Lady and the Vamp
episodes.overview: MAD searches for the key to immortality in Dracula's castle in Transylvania.

episodes.name: The Walking Head Cold
episodes.overview: MAD infects HQ with a head-cold zombie virus.

episodes.name: Get Smarts
episodes.overview: Claw develops a brain-drainer, which Talon uses to steal other people's intelligence and make himself smarter.

episodes.name: Escape Room with a View
episodes.overview: MAD lures Gadget into an escape room, hoping to televise his demise to the world.

episodes.name: Who Do Voodoo
episodes.overview: Claw wants a magic crutch that causes bad luck so he can curse all his enemies.

episodes.name: Midnight MADness
episodes.overview: Claw uses moonlight to create a ray that causes people to experience their worst fears.

episodes.name: Gadg-ED
episodes.overview: When Gadget needs to be recertified, MAD tries to make sure he fails the recertification test.

episodes.name: See You Later, Super Gator
episodes.overview: Claw develops a helmet that will raise the intelligence of any animal and wants it used to create an alligator army.

episodes.name: Rain of Terror
episodes.overview: MAD uses a weather machine to try and conquer the world.

episodes.name: The Truth Is Under There
episodes.overview: MAD sets out to capture a long-crashed alien spacecraft.

episodes.name: Frienemy of the State
episodes.overview: When Talon is caught, Claw replaces him with Penny's friend Mal.

episodes.name: MADhenge
episodes.overview: When Penny interferes with Talon's attempt to collect cosmic energy from Stonehenge, both Penny and Talon are given cosmic powers.

episodes.name: The Claw Who Stole Christmas
episodes.overview: Claw sets out to end Christmas by unleashing cheer-destroying nanobots at a tree lighting ceremony.

episodes.name: The Thingy
episodes.overview: Talon is sent to the North Pole to acquire a newly-discovered, unclassified, biological organism.

episodes.name: The Talon-ted Mr. Colin
episodes.overview: Talon infiltrates HQ while undercover, hoping to get HQ's missile defense codes from Kayla.

episodes.name: MADzilla
episodes.overview: MAD sets out to steal a size modification ray, but accidentally makes MADcat grow to giant size.

episodes.name: Anti-gravity
episodes.overview: MAD attempts to steal a gravity nullifying device.

episodes.name: Too Many Talons
episodes.overview: Claw sends Talon to steal a duplicating device, which Talon uses to duplicate himself.

episodes.name: Star Power
episodes.overview: MAD begins stealing the "star power" from celebrities.

episodes.name: Panda-monium
episodes.overview: Talon impersonates a panda to disrupt peace talks between two countries.

episodes.name: Under the MADnight Sun
episodes.overview: MAD tries to mine a highly magnetic ore from the forest where Gadget and Penny are camping.

episodes.name: Skyrates Off the Starboard Bow!
episodes.overview: MAD sets out to hijack Sir Owen Barnstormer's new Ultra Blimp Mark II and take its cold fusion power source.

episodes.name: Fate it ‘til You Make it
episodes.overview: MAD tries to the Oracle of Delphi so they can use her ability to see the future.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Screentime
episodes.overview: MAD sends out a hypnotizing image on every screen in the world.

episodes.name: The MADstache of Professor Coin
episodes.overview: Talon disguises himself as Penny, while making Penny look like a MAD agent.

episodes.name: MADthuselah
episodes.overview: Claw develops a device to make people old, making himself younger by comparison. Penny becomes a senior during a fight with Talon.

episodes.name: The Heir Affhair
episodes.overview: Talon kidnaps a wealthy old lady and tries to convince her to make him her heir.

episodes.name: Parched Nemesis
episodes.overview: MAD steals all the water in Metro City.

episodes.name: Trees Company
episodes.overview: The MAD Weed-whacko has been rehabilitated, but Claw wants him to destroy Central Park in New York.

episodes.name: MADtrack
episodes.overview: Gadget is assigned to transport Jacques Crankcase to prison, via a hover-train.

episodes.name: The Missionball Ball
episodes.overview: MAD infiltrates HQ's Missionball Ball with a weapon that forces people to dance.

episodes.name: Tell Me What Sphinx
episodes.overview: MAD attempts to find a superweapon in the Great Sphinx of Giza.

episodes.name: Harmageddon
episodes.overview: MAD tries to redirect a comet so that it crashes into Metro City.

episodes.name: Do No Arm
episodes.overview: Penny breaks her arm and is sent to a hospital where a MAD plot is afoot.

episodes.name: Inspector Gadget Goes to Jail
episodes.overview: When Talon frames Gadget for shoplifting and gets him thrown in prison, Penny must break the rules to get him out.

episodes.name: We Had a Really Good Title for This One... But We Forgot It
episodes.overview: MAD uses a memory eraser device to try and defeat Gadget.
